metadata.title: CVE-2017-12964 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: There is a stack consumption issue in LibSass 3.4.5 that is triggered inthe function Sass::Eval::operator() in eval.cpp. It will lead to a remotedenial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
